workflow.name: Audit web pages for SEO issues with Decodo, GPT-4 and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## What this workflow does

This workflow automatically audits web pages for SEO issues and generates an executive-friendly SEO report using AI.

It is designed for marketers, founders, and SEO teams who want fast, actionable insights without manually reviewing HTML, meta tags, or SERP data.

**The workflow:**

1. Reads URLs from Google Sheets


![image.png](fileId:3823)

2. Scrapes page content using Decodo (reliable scraping, even on protected sites)

3. Extracts key SEO elements (title, meta description, canonical, H1/H2, visible text)

4. Uses an AI Agent to analyze the page and generate:

- Overall SEO status

- Top issues

- Quick wins

- Title & meta description recommendations

- Saves results to Google Sheets

- Sends a formatted HTML executive report by email (Gmail)

![image.png](fileId:3824)

## Who this workflow is for

This template is ideal for:

SEO consultants and agencies

SaaS marketing teams

Founders monitoring their landing pages

Content teams doing SEO quality control

It focuses on on-page SEO fundamentals, not backlink analysis or technical crawling.

## Setup (step by step)

**1. Google Sheets**

Create an input sheet with one URL per row

Create an output sheet to store SEO results

**2. Decodo**

Add your Decodo API credentials

The URL is automatically taken from the input sheet
üëâ [Decodo ‚Äì Web Scraper for n8n](https://visit.decodo.com/raqXGD)

**3. AI Agent**

Connect your LLM credentials (OpenAI, Gemini, etc.)

The prompt is already optimized for non-technical SEO summaries

**4. Gmail**

Connect your Gmail account

Set the recipient email address

Emails are sent in clean HTML format

**Notes & disclaimer**

This is a community template

Results depend on page accessibility and content structure

It focuses on on-page SEO, not backlinks or rankings

workflow.name: SEO Page Auditing with Decodo Scraper, GPT and Gmail Report

parameters.content:
## AI SEO Watchdog ‚Äî Overview & Configuration

This workflow automatically audits web pages for SEO and generates an **executive-friendly SEO summary** for each page.

It reads URLs from Google Sheets, scrapes the page content using **Decodo**, reduces the raw HTML to key SEO elements, and analyzes them with an AI Agent.  
The result is a structured SEO report with issues, quick wins, and recommendations, which is then:
- Stored in Google Sheets
- Sent by email as a formatted executive summary (Gmail)

### How to configure it

1. **Google Sheets**
   - Create one sheet with input URLs (one URL per row)
   - Create another sheet to store SEO results

2. **Decodo**
   - Add your Decodo API credentials
   - The URL field is automatically taken from the input sheet  
[Decodo ‚Äì Web Scraper for n8n](https://visit.decodo.com/raqXGD)

3. **AI Agent**
   - Connect your LLM credentials (e.g. OpenAI or Gemini)
   - The prompt is already optimized for executive SEO summaries

4. **Gmail**
   - Connect your Gmail account
   - Set the recipient email address
   - The email is sent in HTML format with clear formatting

The workflow can be executed manually or scheduled for continuous SEO monitoring.

###  Content Extraction  
URLs are read from Google Sheets.
Each page is scraped using Decodo to reliably fetch the HTML content.

###  AI Analysis
JavaScript reduces the HTML to key SEO elements.
The AI Agent analyzes the data and generates an executive SEO summary.

### Data Output  

Results are saved to Google Sheets.
A formatted SEO summary is sent by email using Gmail.

options.systemMessage:
You are an SEO auditor producing an executive summary for non-technical stakeholders.

Input is a compact SEO extract:
TITLE, META_DESCRIPTION, CANONICAL, H1/H2, and a short visible-text excerpt.

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{
  "overall_status": "good"|"needs_attention"|"critical",
  "top_issues": [string],           // max 5 bullets, short
  "quick_wins": [string],           // max 5 bullets, actionable
  "title_recommendation": string|null,
  "meta_description_recommendation": string|null,
  "notes": string|null              // 1‚Äì2 lines
}

Rules:
- Keep it short and executive-friendly.
- No markdown, no emojis.
- If info is missing, explain briefly in notes.

nodes.name: Save SEO Report to Google Sheets1

parameters.message:
=

Hi,

Here is the latest SEO Watchdog executive summary for:
this page

Status: Needs attention

üîé Top issues

  • Title is too long and may be truncated in search results
  • Meta description is lengthy and lacks clear calls-to-action
  • H1 is generic and does not strongly reflect primary keywords
  • Canonical URL points only to homepage, no specific page URL provided
  • H2 headings are numerous and unfocused, reducing clarity

‚ö° Quick wins

  • Shorten the title to under 60 characters focusing on the main keyword
  • Rewrite the meta description to under 160 characters with clear benefits and CTAs
  • Refine the H1 to better reflect primary keywords and user intent
  • Ensure the canonical URL matches the specific page URL
  • Consolidate H2 tags to emphasize main offerings and keywords

üè∑Ô∏è Recommended title

Best API for Historical Stock Market Prices & Financial Data | Free Trial

üìù Recommended meta description

Access historical and real-time stock prices for 150,000+ tickers with flexible plans. Start your free trial today.

üìå Notes

SEO elements are present but need refinement for optimal search visibility and user engagement. Visible text content is comprehensive but dense.

‚Äî Sent automatically by n8n SEO Watchdog
https://n8n.io
